package.name: readline
package.patch: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} # cat ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}-upstream_fixes-1.patch | patch -p1 sed -i '/MV.*old/d' Makefile.in sed -i '/{OLDSUFF}/c:' support/shlib-install
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} jobcount=2 if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then DISTCC_HOSTS="$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" export DISTCC_HOSTS jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` export CC="distcc gcc" export CXX="distcc g++" fi case $(uname -m) in x86_64) export CFLAGS="-fPIC" ./configure --prefix=/usr --libdir=/lib && make -j $jobcount SHLIB_LIBS=-lncurses CFLAGS="-fPIC" ;; *) ./configure --prefix=/usr --libdir=/lib && make -j $jobcount SHLIB_LIBS=-lncurses ;; esac
package.install: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} make DESTDIR=${TGTDIR} SHLIB_LIBS=-lncurses install mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib mv -v ${TGTDIR}/lib/lib{readline,history}.a ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib rm -v ${TGTDIR}/lib/lib{readline,history}.so ln -sfv ../../lib/libreadline.so.6 ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/libreadline.so ln -sfv ../../lib/libhistory.so.6 ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/libhistory.so
